comments.text:
Currently prcpucfg.h (MDCPUCFG_H) is put into place by the Makefiles.

There was talk in bug 687388 about moving this logic to configure, as the file has more to do with pre-building configuration than actual building.

I don't have a super strong opinion on this and obviously this is low priority. I wouldn't be heartbroken if this were marked WONTFIX.
comments.author: gps@mozilla.com
comments.creator: gps@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Currently prcpucfg.h (MDCPUCFG_H) is put into place by the Makefiles.

There was talk in bug 687388 about moving this logic to configure, as the file has more to do with pre-building configuration than actual building.

I don't have a super strong opinion on this and obviously this is low priority. I wouldn't be heartbroken if this were marked WONTFIX.
